import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./App.css" const Login=()=>{ const [emailLog,setEmailLog] = useState(""); const [passwLog,setPasswLog] = useState(""); const [emailReg,setEmailReg] = useState(""); const [passwReg,setPasswReg] = useState(""); const [name,setName] = useState("") const[dataInput, setDataInput]=useState(""); const submitThis=()=>{ const info={emailLog:emailLog,passwLog:passwLog}; setDataInput([info]); } const submitRegister=()=>{ const info={emailReg:emailReg, passwReg:passwReg, name:name}; setDataInput([info]) } const showAlert = () => { alert("Inregistrarea a avut succes"); } return(
